attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How much longer can we send good money to bolster up a failing/failed organisation, there have been billions and billions of pounds sucked into this organisation that has comprehensively failed the British people.
       Our hospitals are old delapidated buildings that are full of the new superbug disease's, as fast as they eradicate them, new more virulent superbugs appear.
                 We cannot opt out of paying tax for this failed organisation,this must change, let this organisation deal with those that cannot work through disability or illness.
        Allow people who work to pay for private health and therefore opt out of paying tax towards this failed organisation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
